OrderAdjustmentGroup.name: OrderAdjustmentGroup
OrderAdjustmentGroup.description: Group containing a set of adjustments applied to an order.

AdjustmentSource.description: Indicates the origin of the adjustment.

AdjustmentType.description: Indicates the type of mathematical adjustment to be applied to the order.

AdjustmentValue.description: The specified AdjustmentType’s amount to be applied to the order.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency used for the checkout session. Default value is USD.

Description.description: User-entered information about the order adjustment group.

GrandTotalAmount.description: The sum of all total amounts of all adjustments in this group, including tax.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the order adjustment group.

OrderId.description: The unique identifier of the order related to the adjustments in this order adjustment group.

Priority.description: A numeric value that represents the order of precedence of the order adjustment group.

RelatedAdjustmentGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the original order’s adjustment group. This field is a useful reference in change order scenarios.

TotalAmount.description: The total of all order adjustments in this order adjustment group, excluding tax.

TotalTaxAmount.description: The total tax for all order adjustments in this order adjustment group.

Type.description: Indicates how the adjustment was applied to the order.
